name: Dubstep Abasralsa
description: You play as the protagonist who drank a lot of beer in the bar. But the dry law is in force, so run away from the police in order not to pay a fine. Along the way, collecting bottles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows /7/8/10 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
